Java and Spring Boot Specific Checks.description: Potential SQL Injection with PreparedStatement Concatenation
Java and Spring Boot Specific Checks.recommended_action: Use parameterized queries with placeholders (?) in PreparedStatements to avoid SQL injection vulnerabilities.

Java and Spring Boot Specific Checks.description: Potential SQL Injection in JPA NamedQuery

Avoid deserializing untrusted data; use secure alternatives or whitelist classes.
Ensure Jackson ObjectMapper is configured with safe default typing to avoid deserialization issues.
